akn:content.akn:p:
§ 554. National identification system not authorized Nothing in this chapter shall be construed to authorize the development of a national identification system or card. (Pub. L. 107–296, title XV, § 1514, Nov. 25, 2002, 116 Stat. 2311.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThis chapter, referred to in text, was in the original “this Act”, meaning Pub. L. 107–296, Nov. 25, 2002, 116 Stat. 2135, known as the Homeland Security Act of 2002, which is classified principally to this chapter. For complete classification of this Act to the Code, see Short Title note set out under section 101 of this title and Tables.
